_source.short_desc: Built on Zoom's platform, Zoom's full-featured cloud phone consolidates business communication and collaboration into a single system.
_source.long_desc: Built on Zoom's easy, reliable, and secure platform, Zooms full-featured cloud phone  consolidates all business communication and collaboration into a single system. Available in 40+ countries, with expandable coverage through a bring-your-own-carrier offering, Zoom Phone supports inbound and outbound calling through the public switched telephone network (PSTN).
_source.pricing_details: Zoom Phone is available as an add-on to Zoom, from $10/user/month

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Call Conferencing
category_features.definition: Facilitate virtual conferences that connect multiple people remotely

category_features.name: Call Monitoring
category_features.definition: Listen in on live phone conversations to train and assess agent performance

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Facilitate virtual conferences that connect multiple people remotely

category_features.name: Call Routing
category_features.definition: The procedure of sending voice calls to a specific queue based on predetermined criteria

category_features.name: Call Screening
category_features.definition: Access caller ID Information including number of the caller to decide how to treat the call

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: IVR / Voice Recognition
category_features.definition: Reads and accepts a combination of touch tone keypad selections and voice inputs to provide the appropriate prerecorded voice response

category_features.name: Online Voice Transmission
category_features.definition: Transmit voice and other information digitally

category_features.name: SIP Trunking
category_features.definition: Session Initiation protocol (SIP) trunking enables the connectivity to send and receive calls over the internet

category_features.name: Unified Communications
category_features.definition: Consolidate and integrate communication tools as one platform or entity to enhance business communication and collaboration

category_features.name: Voicemail Transcription
category_features.definition: Transcribe voicemail audio messages to written text that is sent over email

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Ridiculously simple screen sharing tool for meetings on the fly. Get everybody on the same page, when they're not in the same room!
related_products.features: join.me is the fastest and easiest way to connect and collaborate. Anyone can share ideas instantly with screen sharing, audio, video, whiteboard and chat. join.me is a personalized meeting experience where users can personalize participant bubbles, URLs, backgrounds and more!

related_products.short_desc: RingCentral MVP provides reliable, high-quality phone service anywhere you have internet access.
related_products.features:
RingCentral VoIP (voice over internet protocol) is part of a secure, reliable cloud communications platform that eliminates the need for on-premise PBX hardware. 

With mobile apps, online meetings, and business SMS, it's more than a phone system, it's comprehensive hosted business communications at its best.

related_products.short_desc: RingCentral MVP provides reliable, high-quality phone service anywhere you have internet access.
related_products.features:
RingCentral VoIP (voice over internet protocol) is part of a secure, reliable cloud communications platform that eliminates the need for on-premise PBX hardware. 

With mobile apps, online meetings, and business SMS, it's more than a phone system, it's comprehensive hosted business communications at its best.

related_products.short_desc: Talkdesk is intuitive, cloud-based contact center software with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations.
related_products.features: Talkdesk is next-generation cloud-based call center software that helps you connect with your customers. The easy-to-use interface offers robust functionality with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations with 25+ business tools to empower sales and service teams to have personalized, effective conversations with customers.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 business VoIP system used by over 8 million businessed worldwide. Cloud, mobile and open source versions available.
related_products.features: If you are looking for a free VoIP phone system for your small business, Bitrix24 is what you need. Unlike other voip solutions, Bitrix24 works both as your internal PBX system and as contact center for inbound and outbound calls. It's also the only free voip system that comes with fully featured free CRM. Importantly, when you clients call you from a phone number recorded in CRM, they will be identified, connected to assigned manager and their phone call can be logged and recorded.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad Talk is VoIP technology built for modern businesses, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad Talk is a modern cloud-based VoIP phone system that keeps teams connected across all their devices. Dialpad Talk's native Voice Intelligence features boost productivity with real-time transcription and post-call summaries, including highlighted action items. Plus integrations with G Suite, Office 365, OneLogin, Okta, and Salesforce create rapid deployments, easy user provisioning and automatic syncing with the apps your team uses everyday.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Customer Service with Practical AI - Inbound, Outbound, ACD, IVR, IVA, CTI, Chat, Email, Call Recording, and CRM Integration.
related_products.features: Create personalized customer service experiences over the phone, web, chat, and more with the power of Practical AI. Our best-in-class AI automates interactions and assist your live agents, reducing service costs while you deliver a more conversational service experience. It's like having a brand new, international team that speaks hundreds of languages and streamlines your most critical business operations

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

related_products.short_desc: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business.
related_products.features: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business. From the first phone call to the final invoice and every touchpoint in between, Weave connects the entire customer journey. Weave's software solutions transform how local businesses attract, communicate with and engage customers to grow their business.

similar_products.short_desc: Aircall is the most intuitive VoIP solution. Experience an easy set up, no hardware, and dozens of CRM integrations.
similar_products.features: Make every phone conversation count and give time back to your reps. Aircall's flexible VoIP phone solution integrates with 80+ CRM, helpdesk, and other critical business tools to surface the information your reps need to be successful, when they need it. Join 9,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their customer and prospect relationships with first-class phone features like: SMS, advanced call routing, IVR, analytics, power dialer, call tagging, and other collaborative features.

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
similar_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

similar_products.short_desc: With SkySwitch, resellers can offer their end-users communication and collaboration services with ease even if they are not experts.
similar_products.features: SkySwitch offers the ultimate white-label UCaaS platform for MSPs, VARs, System Integrators, Interconnects and like providers to quickly brand as their own and resell to their customer base.  Get up and running selling a hybrid workforce solution -- UCaaS/hosted voice -- in as little as 90 days. Expand your service offerings and revenue stream. Our top resellers on average annualized growth rate is 40%.

similar_products.short_desc: Phone.com offers all the features of a big enterprise phone system without the cost and complexity.
similar_products.features: Phone.com provides you with Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technology to connect your phone to an existing internet connection to make phone calls. Phone.com is the leading cloud-based phone company focused on the needs of small businesses and entrepreneurs.  In addition to offering a variety of innovative, customizable and cost-effective communications solutions, Phone.com delivers award-winning U.S. based customer support to more than 25,000 customers across America.

similar_products.short_desc: We think VoIP pricing should be simple. With InfoFloTalk you pay just $29.99 per line and get UNLIMITED extensions.
similar_products.features: We think VoIP pricing should be simple. With InfoFloTalk you pay just $29.99 per line and get UNLIMITED extensions. We are the only VoIP provider on this list who charges per line and not per extension. No hidden costs, no gimmicks. If you are currently paying per extension then you are overpaying. Sure, you could work with a bigger VoIP provider, but bigger doesn?t mean better. No one can match us head on when it comes to our superior technology or customer-first pricing model. Pay per line

similar_products.short_desc: Unlimited Voice, SMS, Fax, Chat, Video. Fully Customizable and Scalable to fit your Needs. All with our Award-winning 24/7/365 support.
similar_products.features:
ULTATEL is a recognized industry leader in business VoIP communications. With the power of cloud technology, we help businesses empower their people to be more productive and connect with their customers wherever they are.

Our plans come fully customizable and scalable with unlimited Voice, SMS, Fax, Chat, and Video.
 
As an integration pioneer, ULTATEL can do much more than build a great phone system. We can integrate with your existing systems to get you the results you want, seamlessly.

similar_products.short_desc: Get the perfect phone number for your small business and turn the world into our office with the Grasshopper virtual phone system.
similar_products.features: Turn the world into your office with Grasshopper, the virtual phone system for small businesses. Get a local, toll free, or vanity phone number to represent your business or bring your own number! Forward calls anywhere and use our mobile and desktop apps to communicate with clients over voice or text, be notified in real time of missed calls & voicemails, and have your voicemails transcribed and sent via email. Try us risk free for 30 days with our money-back guarantee.

similar_products.short_desc: Kixie is the sales engagement platform that boosts sales team performance with ultra-reliable, easily-automated calling & texting.
similar_products.features: Better Sales, Made Simple. Kixie is the sales engagement platform that boosts sales team performance with ultra-reliable, easily-automated calling and texting for Hubspot, SalesForce, Zoho, Pipedrive, and leading CRMs. Supercharge your CRM into an automated sales machine with intelligent autodialing, seamless CRM integration, and Enterprise phone service. Start making calls in 3 minutes with no hardware and a 100% free trial.

similar_products.short_desc: The effective, affordable, and easy-to-use VoIP solution, AVOXI. See how easy it can be when you try risk-free!
similar_products.features: With AVOXI, your VoIP phone number setup is fast and easy. There are no setup fees or minimum contracts. Every VoIP number includes 20+ features at no additional cost. Get your virtual phone number today for as low as $4.49 per month.

similar_products.short_desc:
Redefine business communication with a flexible, reliable, and cost-effective cloud
telephony system specially built for SMBs.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Voice is cloud-based VoIP phone software that helps you easily make and receive
business calls from any device. Zoho Voice integrates with other Zoho apps, like CRM,
Desk, Recruit, and Bigin, so your teams can save time by managing calls without
switching apps. Get advanced cloud telephony features like IVRs, click-to-call, call
queues, call recording, business hours, call transfers, live call monitoring, and much
more. It's time to modernize the way you manage business calls.

similar_products.short_desc: No matter your business communication requirement, Acefone has you covered with its bespoke cloud telephony solutions.
similar_products.features: Acefone is a VoIP solution provider trusted by 10,000+ reputed companies. From guaranteed 99.99% uptime and 24x7x365 support to unlimited calling, get everything your business needs for flawless customer service and butter-smooth operations. Expand your outreach and maximize your conversions anytime, anywhere. Truly, with Acefone, you always get the best. Start your 14-day FREE trial today.

similar_products.short_desc: When you choose JustCall's VoIP system, you choose value. We're rated #1 For SMBs and trusted by 6000+ customers.
similar_products.features:
Try JustCall Business VoIP. #1 VoIP software for modern remote teams. 
Set up your business VoIP system in just 5 minutes. Save a day a week for your reps. Switch to a single platform for all your customer communication and workflow automation needs.  Call software, virtual numbers, SMS campaigns, native CRM integrations, and lots more at just $25 per user.

Signup & get 70% discount for the first month

similar_products.short_desc: SMBs w/ 10-100 users save money & time with the Intulse managed VoIP services. BYOD or buy/rent phones. Softphone. 100% US support.
similar_products.features: Cloud VoIP services for businesses from Intulse. 100% US-based support. Feature-rich hosted VoIP service. Enterprise-grade voice, fax, text, and mobile app at small business pricing. Get business VoIP phone service with CRM integrations (Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, and many more). We handle all of your system setup. Managed VoIP services from Intulse means no hassles or headaches. Friendly, available & knowledgeable live support (100% US-based). Flexible device options (BYOD or buy/rent from us).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audio Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audio Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audio Conferencing software allows multiple people to dial in and join the same audio-only call. This type of software may also include live chat, call recording, video conferencing, and other features that enable online communication between remote teams, stakeholders, and customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Accounting software helps businesses gain insights into call logs, telephone usage and cost trends. Call Accounting solutions help create accountability for telecom resources across corporate departments. They also help to eliminate vendor over-billings by automating invoice processing. Within organizations, Call Accounting software helps to identify unused telecom resources as well as to offer insight into call and cost trends. Call Accounting software is related to Telecom Expense Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telecom Expense Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telecom Expense Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telecom Expense Management software automates the process of monitoring, auditing and reducing telecom billing expenses. These applications aid call centers, help desks and other organizations measure, manage, predict and optimize expenditures related to their telephone systems. Telecom Expense Management solutions also aid in distributing key performance data throughout an enterprise as well as forecasting for infrastructure investment and eliminating internal fraud. Telecom Expense Management software is related to Billing and Provisioning software and Call Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telephony software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telephony tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telephony software automates the electronic transmission of voice and data, often to improve call center efficiency. These applications allow all types of organizations increased flexibility in managing their incoming and outgoing call options as well as a variety of fax and data features. In addition to optimizing an organization's internal operations, Telephony software also offers expanded outgoing capabilities, providing an infrastructure for call center management, help desk operations, predictive dialing applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solutions and telemarketing software.
